article_title: 115 Doctors Propose This Solution For Terrifying Cancer Drug Prices

article_metadata.author: Matthew Herper

og.description: How furious do doctors and patients have to get about the exploding prices of cancer drugs before something happens to change our medical system? Probably even more angry than this: “A lot of people think this is a free market for these drugs and therefore there is an internal regulation but it isn’t. What [...]
